misc: Loves basketball even more than Marcus, making some fans wonder if he's a real golfer
biography: Pasi, affectionately known as "Susi-Pasi", is a formidable competitor hailing from Vuosaari Golf Helsinki. With three prior appearances at the Hector Trophée, Pasi is set to make his fourth appearance in 2025.

A man of considerable competitive spirit, Pasi has secured one victory at the Hector Trophée in the past, demonstrating his capability to perform under pressure and secure important wins for his team. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him so far, he will surely be looking to add that to his accolades soon.

Off the course, Pasi's passion for basketball is well-known, perhaps rivaling even that of Marcus. Some fans have jokingly questioned whether his true calling lies on the hardcourt rather than the green, but there is no denying that Pasi is one of the more enthusiastic golf players. His dedication to golf is unquestionable, and fans eagerly anticipate his performance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.
